SEARCH
Package be.kdg.memorace.model

Class MusicHandler

java.lang.Object
be.kdg.memorace.model.MusicHandler
public class MusicHandler extends Object
This class provides methods to handle the background music and sound effects in the game. It allows you to play, stop and adjust the volume of different types of music and sounds.
Since:
08/12/2022
Author:
Vera Wise, Elias De Hondt
